thread.title: Barcelona's Mascherano a major doubt for PSG clash
thread.title_full: Barcelona's Mascherano a major doubt for PSG clash

title: Barcelona's Mascherano a major doubt for PSG clash
text:
0 08-Feb-2017 19:05:34 The centre-back has suffered a thigh injury that places his participation in the Champions League trip to Paris in doubt 
Barcelona defender Javier Mascherano has suffered an injury to his left thigh, the La Liga champions have confirmed. 
Mascherano was introduced as a 62nd-minute substitute in place of Denis Suarez during Tuesday's hard-fought 1-1 draw against Atletico Madrid in the Copa del Rey. 
Barca prevailed 3-2 on aggregate in the semi-final tie but ended the 90 minutes at Camp Nou with nine men after Sergi Roberto and Luis Suarez were sent off. 
Argentina international Mascherano completed the match but was in discomfort at the final whistle. 
"The FC Barcelona medical staff have confirmed after tests carried out on Javier Mascherano that the first team player has a left thigh injury," a club statement read. "His return to action will depend on his recovery." 
Although Barcelona did not put a timescale on Mascherano's recovery, a report by Mundo Deportivo said he could face two to three weeks on the sidelines â€“ an absence that would rule him out of next Tuesday's Champions League last-16 trip to Paris Saint-Germain. Related
